desc: Buy the most unique & authentic sneakers from Air Jordan, Nike, Yeezy & more online. Fairfax Dubai has an extensive collection of premium footwear, streetwear from Drew, Travis-Scott, and accessories for men, women, and kids. Also, check out our uber-cool collectibles from Bearbrick & Kaws. Shop now.
